title: The Haunting of Hill House
info: +16 · 2018 · Drama, Horror, Mystery · 50 minutes per episode
description: A family confronts haunting memories of their old home and the events that drove them from it, while facing new paranormal challenges.

title: American Horror Story
description: An anthology series exploring various horror stories with unique settings each season, ranging from haunted houses to witch covens and alien invasions.

title: Marianne
info: +18 · 2019 · Drama, Horror, Thriller · 40 minutes per episode
description: A famous horror writer is forced to confront the terrifying reality behind her nightmarish creations when the evil spirit from her stories becomes real.

title: The Fall of the House of Usher
info: +16 · 2023 · Drama, Horror, Mystery · 60 minutes per episode
description: A modern take on Edgar Allan Poe's classic story, exploring the downfall of the Usher family amidst tragedy, mystery, and eerie forces.

title: Midnight Mass
info: +18 · 2021 · Drama, Horror, Mystery · 50 minutes per episode
